name: Tissue Box Simulator
description:
I want to be able to throw a lot of floaty tissues or scarves in VR. So I have set out to make that a reality...  in virtual reality.

Right now it's only confirmed to work with a Dell Visor, which is the headset I have. It will probably work with any other Windows Mixed Reality (WMR) headset. I do not expect it to work with Vive or Oculus right now in the Alpha 0.1 state.
